author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Garden Bio-chemical High-tech says dividend payment date on May 4
text:
April 26(Reuters) - Zhejiang Garden Bio-chemical High-tech Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 1.40 yuan (before tax) per 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 15 new shares for every 10 shares for FY 2017, to shareholders of record on May 3
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 4 and the dividend will be paid on May 4
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/U5jRCk
